title: ***9/1 NEW RENOVATION-KENDALL SQ/LECHMERE PET-FRIENDLY 1BED WITH AC!
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE 09/01/2022', '1/2 FEE PAID BY OWNER', 'A beautiful and newly renovated 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom rental apartment on Lopez Ave in Kendall Square-Cambridge.', 'The unit features in-unit laundry, oak HW floors, high efficiency windows, all new plumbing, electrical, HVAC, sprinklers, and more!', 'Building is located on a quiet street with a shared back yard.', 'Easy access to the T at Lechmere or Kendall!', 'On-street parking with a residential permit.', 'Cats & dogs considered by the owner-pet fees apply.', ' No off-street parking, and students ok with co-signers', 'Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'BenC @', 'Benjaminapartments .', 'com', '860-485-5721', 'Transportation', 'Bus: CT2 Amesbury St @ Vassar St (0.44 mi)', 'Bus: 47 Brookline St @ Tudor St (0.03 mi)', 'Bus: 64 Magazine St @ Perry St (0.16 mi)', 'Bus: 1 Massachusetts Ave @', 'Prospect St (0.29 mi)', 'Bus: 70 Franklin St @ Sidney St (0.20 mi)', 'Bus: 83 Magazine St @ Green St (0.27 mi)', 'Subway: Red Line Central (0.28 mi)', 'Bus: 68 Broadway @ Columbia St (0.59 mi)']
